subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Zdeno Chara had never taken a shot during a shootout before, but he made his first attempt count last night, lifting the Bruins to a 4-3 victory against the Islanders in Boston.
snippet: Zdeno Chara had never taken a shot during a shootout before, but he made his first attempt count last night, lifting the Bruins to a 4-3 victory against the Islanders in Boston.
